name: Arctic Wolf
description:
From deep in the arctic circle, a young wolf awakens. You must help him survive and thrive against the harsh winter conditions. It's your duty to prepare him for life in the real world. He's ready to fish and hunt down rabbits to build up his strength, but you must guide him. When he is big enough, the wolf will be ready to challenge all the enemy bosses.. This 3D wild animal simulator allows you to take control of this ferocious Arctic Wolf as he freely roams near and far to hunt his enemies. Help him grow up to fight the big animal bosses. Find your 2 mates and start your thriving family. The realistic 3D map is massive so take your time to explore all the areas to find all the bosses. Animal simulation at its best.

The goal of the game is quite clear : defeat all 5 bosses. The 5 bosses include Arctic Fox, Polar Bear, Orca, Sea Lion, and Moose. Of course we threw in some eagles and rabbits for more challenges. The more you play, the more your animal grows, the stronger he becomes. Packed with super fun sounds for your gaming enjoyment. Survival is the name of the game.

Top Game Features:

-- Fast paced and Continuous action game play
-- Refill your energy by hunting and fishing
-- Survive the arctic elements like snow and freezing rain
-- Defeat all 5 Arctic Beasts
-- Bosses include Polar Bear, Wild White Fox, Orca, Sea Lion, and Giant Moose
-- Huge Open Ice and Tundra World 3D Map
-- Dynamic weather and time of day. The longer you survive, the more changes you will experience.
-- Fun animations and sound effects  We would love to hear from you.

Stop by our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.  
Please be sure and check out our other 3D animal simulators. We agree that the app is not perfect, and we welcome your constructive criticism. It helps us improve. Please email us suggestions. At Wild Foot we are looking for things we can do to improve the app. Now stop reading and help your Wolf get huge!
